$description:
| What does this do? | Along with Baseline - Emergency Access, ensures two emergency access accounts have been defined |
| Why should you use this? | Ensures emergency access/break-glass accounts are available in the event of losing access to administrative functions. |
| What is the end-user impact? | None. |
| Learn more | [Security emergency access](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/roles/security-emergency-access) |
